translation:
The government orders that the esteemed Commanders of the Brigades, Corps, and Squadrons, as soon as they receive this, proceed to provide, through the appropriate channels, to the Excellency.

The government also recommends that the esteemed Commanders of Divisions, Brigades, etc., through whose conduct the said relationships must be followed, mention the order officers who are not attached or assigned to any of the bodies. The government expects from these esteemed Commanders a scrupulous examination and much circumspection regarding this requirement.
